Career Exploration 2018

Ignite the Spark!

Gilo Dancel

Graduated BS Computer Science specializing in Data Science and Analytics Enterprise Systems
Senior Software Developer @ ZAP Philippines
Co-founder and Lead Developer @ Black Tea Ventures

What is technology?

“Technology is the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes, especially in industry”
Technology is the continuous pursuit to make things better

Why am I in Information Technology?

    1. Compensation
    2. Enjoyment
    3. Fulfillment
    4. I get to stay at my desk

Why have I considered changing careers?

It's incredibly frustrating

Why am I in information technology?

Part ii

“If it's not hard it's not worth it.”

Who should consider having a career in technology?

To be honest, anyone.

SOME TIPS

    1. Understand that this is not for everyone
    2. Make smart decisions
    3. Find a good teacher/mentor
    4. Learn to learn on your own
    5. Be ready to deal with people
    6. Find a passion outside of work

Having a career in technology is a constant struggle to keep up with everybody else

Build your own process
